title: Zipcode Destiny
description: There's a core belief embedded in the story of the United States: the American Dream. This week we discuss the state of that dream with economist Raj Chetty.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: There's a core belief embedded in the story of the United States: the American Dream. This week we discuss the state of that dream with economist Raj Chetty.
